comments.author: 1704893@student.swin.edu.au
comments.creator: 1704893@student.swin.edu.au
comments.raw_text:
I think it would be good to support file drag-out feature.
At the moment it is supported only by Google Chrome, however it is really easy and enjoyable to save your files with the help of this feature and I guess it will become more popular in recent time.
Attached html document should allow a user to save any of two presented files in any directory on user's computer by simple drag-and-drop operation.
If you try to do it with Firefox 7, you will get a shortcut of this file saved. Moreover not always you will be able to open it successfully.
Drag-out feature will allow user to save the files by dropping it into directory on user’s computer.
comments.text:
Created attachment 565722
html document with script of drag-out

I think it would be good to support file drag-out feature.
At the moment it is supported only by Google Chrome, however it is really easy and enjoyable to save your files with the help of this feature and I guess it will become more popular in recent time.
Attached html document should allow a user to save any of two presented files in any directory on user's computer by simple drag-and-drop operation.
If you try to do it with Firefox 7, you will get a shortcut of this file saved. Moreover not always you will be able to open it successfully.
Drag-out feature will allow user to save the files by dropping it into directory on user’s computer.

comments.creator: MatsPalmgren_bugz@use.startmail.com
comments.author: MatsPalmgren_bugz@use.startmail.com
comments.raw_text:
Works for me, Firefox 7 on Ubuntu 11.04 (using KDE window manager).

Does it work if you press the Control key while you drop?
comments.text:
Works for me, Firefox 7 on Ubuntu 11.04 (using KDE window manager).

Does it work if you press the Control key while you drop?

I am working on Windows 7. Pressing and holding control key while droping doesn't make any difference. Only shortcut is created.
I change Platform in Description from All to Windows 7.
